captions: We set out with a mission to make all the world’s art freely accessible to anyone with an Internet connection
To fulfill this mission we are building the largest public database of art for educational use…
…and making it possible to find and collect art and design from galleries around the world—all in one place.

credits.name: Édouard Manet
credits.title: Luncheon on the Grass (Le Déjeuner sur l'herbe)

main.headline: We made 10× the introductions between galleries and collectors from all over the world than 2013
main.description: In June, Artsy celebrated the 55th Venice Biennale with an in-depth look at 77 national pavilions and exhibitions, from Angola to Uruguay. We created a place to explore and learn about one of the art world’s most important events.

main.headline: Our gallery partners added over 100,000 for-sale works in 2014
main.description: We created a place to explore and learn about one of the art world’s most important events.

main.headline: The average distance between galleries and collectors was 3200 miles
